pages.title: Elemental Nodes
pages.text: Elemental Nodes are condensed manifestations of the four classical elements — Water, Air, Fire, and Earth. Created through a $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual)Nature’s Ritual$(/l), each Node embodies raw elemental essence used in crafting.

pages.title: Creation
pages.text: Each Node is crafted by transmuting an $(thing)Amethyst Shard$() together with one natural plant and one element-related item at the Ritual Table. These Nodes serve as versatile components across Hexalia’s mechanics.
